혐오체

ABOMINATION

혐오체 만들기

BUILDING ABOMINATIONS

혐오체 are a grouping of the outsider type in the same way that 데몬 are a grouping of the outsider type. The accompanying table indicates the average values an 혐오체 of a given size might have for its basic physical scores. 혐오체 also share several other characteristics.

혐오체 특성
Abomination Traits

All 혐오체 are born directly (or indirectly) from a god and some 하급 creature (or idea), but none are favored, wanted, or loved. Still, they all share a tiny spark of deific energy, which grants them the qualities described in below. (Note: deity rules are used, 혐오체 are rank 0 deities.)

Immunities (Ex): 혐오체 are immune to polymorphing, petrification, or any form-altering 공격. They are not subject to 정령 흡수, ability drain, or ability 피해. They are immune to 정신영향계 effects (charms, compulsions, phantasms, patterns, and morale effects), and are immune to one of five energy types (specific to 혐오체).

저항(Ex): 혐오체 have fire 저항 20, cold 저항 20, and 피해 축소 of at least 10/에픽(certain 혐오체 have higher 피해 축소). 혐오체 all have significant 주문 저항. 혐오체 resist detection, and are all treated as if affected by a 탐지방어 spell of a 시전자 레벨 equal to the 혐오체의 HD.

특성(Ex): All 혐오체 have the 유사주문 ability to use 진실의 시야 at will. 혐오체 are not subject to death from massive 피해, and they have maximum 히트 포인트 per Hit Die. 혐오체 have the blindsight extraordinary ability to a 거리 of 500 feet. 혐오체 can choose both nonepic and 에픽 특기 as part of their feat selection.

정신감응(Su): 혐오체 can communicate telepathically with any creature within 1,000 feet that has a language.

Summon Creature (Sp): 혐오체 can summon creatures associated either with the portfolio of their godly progenitor or with their 감금. Summoned creatures serve 혐오체 without question. Summoned creatures automatically return whence they came after 1 hour, or sooner if slain. See specific 혐오체 entries for additional details on summoning.

빠른 치료 and 재생: Most 혐오체 have some measure of 빠른 치료 and 재생, ranging from 5 to 55 for both 능력. Usually, higher HD 혐오체 have higher values for 빠른 치료 and 재생, though this not always the case. If an 혐오체 has 재생, it is usually subject to normal 피해 from at least two sources, one of which is the antithesis for their subtype, and the other of which is somehow tied to some unique feature of the 혐오체.

자연 갑옷: All 혐오체 have some degree of 자연 갑옷 보너스 ranging from +10 to +100. Usually, higher HD 혐오체 have higher 자연 갑옷 보너스, but this is not always the case.

유사주문 능력: All 혐오체 have access to a variety of 주문 in the form of 유사주문 능력, which they can use as 20th- or higher-레벨 casters, depending on 혐오체. No rule governs how many or how few 유사주문 능력 an 혐오체 may claim.

Unique 능력: All 혐오체 have at least one or more unique 능력 tied to their godly parent의 portfolio, or to the manner of their incarceration.

주문 저항: As a general rule of thumb, 혐오체 have 주문 저항 equal to their CR +12.

혐오체 말하기 Abyssal, Celestial, infernal, and often a language associated with their 감금.

A 꿈 애벌래의 natural 무기 are treated as 에픽, evil, and chaotic-aligned for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

전투

Combat

Worst 밤마귀(Su): Each time a living creature first views a specific 꿈 애벌래 from a distance of 30 feet or less (or from a 염탐 effect), the subject sees the image of the most fearsome creature imaginable. This is not an 환영술 or phantasm; 꿈 애벌래 truly becomes, for just that instant, the subject의 worst 밤마귀. 드래곤, 고난도

DRAGON, ADVANCED

The standard 성장 rules allow 드래곤 theoretically infinite progression even beyond the stage of great wyrm. The following rules let 드래곤 improve more than their 히트 다이스 as they progress to 에픽 heights of power.

나이 Category: A standard 드래곤 gains one “virtual 나이 category” for every 3 히트 다이스 it gains beyond the great wyrm stage. 능력 that function once per day per 나이 category or otherwise use 드래곤의 나이 category as part of a calculation use this adjusted number. 에픽 드래곤 gain one 나이 category per 5 히트 다이스 beyond great wyrm.

Size: One important element of 드래곤 성장 is 크기 늘리기. 드래곤 that don’t reach Colossal size by the great wyrm stage can never reach it according to the standard 성장 rules. When advancing a 드래곤, consider its basic size group: 하급(white, black, brass, and 구리 드래곤), ordinary (green, 파랑이, and 청동 드래곤), 상급(silver, red, and gold), or 에픽(force and prismatic). A 드래곤 that is Tiny as a wyrmling is in the 하급 group, a 드래곤 that is Small as a wyrmling and never reaches Colossal size is in the ordinary group, and a 드래곤 that is Small to Large as a wyrmling and reaches Colossal by the great wyrm stage is in the 상급 group. A 하급 드래곤 becomes Colossal when it gains two 나이 categories (6 히트 다이스) beyond great wyrm. It increases to Colossal+ when it gains an additional four 나이 categories (12 HD). An ordinary 드래곤 becomes Colossal when it gains one 나이 category (3 히트 다이스) beyond great wyrm. It increases to Colossal+ when it gains an additional four 나이 categories (12 HD). A 상급 드래곤 becomes Colossal+ when it gains four 나이 categories (12 HD) more than it needed to reach the Colossal size.

에픽 드래곤, already Colossal+ by the time they reach the great wyrm stage, do not increase in size thereafter. Use the information presented under 에픽 드래곤 entry, below, to determine the statistics of a Colossal+ 드래곤.

방어도: A 드래곤의 자연 갑옷 보너스 increases by +1 for every Hit Die it gains beyond the great wyrm stage. (This rule applies for 하급 드래곤 성장 as well, since 자연 갑옷 and 히트 다이스 always increase at the same rate.)

브레스 무기: If a 드래곤의 브레스 무기 deals 피해, 피해 typically increases by 2 주사위 for every virtual 나이 category 드래곤 gains. The two exceptions among standard dragonsare the brass and 하얀 드래곤, whose 브레스 무기 피해 increases by only 1 die per 나이 category. 내성 굴림 DC against a 드래곤의 브레스 무기 remains 10 + 1/2 드래곤의 히트 다이스 + its 건강 수정치.

주문 저항: For standard advanced 드래곤, 주문 저항 increases by 2 per additional 나이 category. For 에픽 드래곤, 주문 저항 increases by 3 (for 힘의 드래곤) or 6 (for 무지갯빛 드래곤) per additional 나이 category.

속도: When a 드래곤 becomes Colossal, its 비행 속도 increases by 50 feet and its maneuverability becomes clumsy. When it reaches Colossal+, its 비행 속도 increases by another 50 feet, and its maneuverability remains clumsy. A 드래곤의 육상 속도 and other special 이동 types (수영, burrow, and so on) do not change.

능력 점수: A great wyrm의 근력 and 건강 scores both increase by +2 for every virtual 나이 category 드래곤 gains. Its 민첩 remains unchanged. Its 지능, 지혜, and 매력 increase by +2 for every two 나이 categories 드래곤 gains.

특수 능력: 드래곤 do not gain additional 유사주문 능력, but their 피해 축소 continues to increase as they gain 히트 다이스. For most 드래곤(the exceptions being the force and 무지갯빛 드래곤), the great wyrm의 피해 축소 increases to 15/에픽 after exceeding the great wyrm 나이 category and 드래곤의 natural 무기 count as 에픽 무기 for 목적 of bypassing 피해 축소.

Force and 무지갯빛 드래곤 have the following DR progression: wyrmling 10/magic, young 15/magic, young adult 15/에픽, mature adult 20/에픽, very old 25/에픽.

시전자 레벨: A great wyrm의 시전자 레벨 increases by 2 for every virtual 나이 category 드래곤 gains. As with the 에픽 드래곤 described later, advanced 드래곤 gain 향상된 주문 용량 feat as 보너스 특기 once for every three 시전자 레벨 above 20th.

특기: Like ordinary 드래곤, advanced 드래곤 receive one feat for every 3 히트 다이스 they have. 특기 gained after 드래곤 attains great wyrm 상태확인 can be 에픽 특기.

도전 지수: For standard 드래곤, CR increases by 2 per additional 나이 category. For 에픽 드래곤, CR increases by 3 per additional 나이 category. All other 드래곤 statistics are as presented for 드래곤 in general and specific 드래곤 varieties.

전투

Combat

Air Mastery (Ex): Airborne creatures take a –1 페널티 on 공격 and 피해 rolls against an 공기 정령.

훨윈드(Su): 정령 can transform itself into a 훨윈드 once every 10 minutes and remain in that form for up to 1 round for every 2 HD it has. In this form, 정령 can 이동 through the air or along a surface at its 비행 속도.  A primal air 훨윈드 is 10 feet wide at the base, 40 feet wide at the top, and up to 80 feet tall. 정령 controls its exact height, but it must be at least 10 feet. Gargantuan or smaller creatures might take 피해 when caught in 훨윈드 and may be lifted into the air. An affected creature must succeed at a Reflex save (DC 53) when it comes into contact with 훨윈드 or take 4d8 points of 피해. It must also succeed at a second Reflex save (DC 53) or be picked up bodily and held suspended in the powerful 바람, automatically taking 4d8 points of 피해 each round. A creature that can 비행 is allowed a Reflex save (DC 53) each round to escape 훨윈드. The creature still takes 피해 but can leave if the save is successful. 정령 can eject any carried creatures whenever it 소원, depositing them wherever 훨윈드 happens to be. A summoned 정령 always ejects trapped creatures before returning to its home plane. If 훨윈드의 base touches the ground, it creates a swirling cloud of debris. This cloud is centered on 정령 and has a diameter equal to half 훨윈드의 height. The cloud obscures all 시야, including 암흑시야, beyond 5 feet. Creatures 5 feet away have one-half 은폐, while those farther away have total 은폐. Those caught in the cloud must succeed at a 집중 check (DC 53) to 주문 시전. The DC is 근력-based.
